attributes.htmlcode:
<style>
body
{
	background: url("/13b6f75d-0118-48c4-8323-751bc54268f0.png");
	background-repeat:repeat-x;
	background-position:top;
	font-family: Arial, Myriad Pro;
}
a, a:active, a:hover, a:focus, div {
	outline:none !important;
}
body.no-subhead
{
	background: url("/92ede430-a533-41e9-9026-761603c3b7f8.png") !important;
	background-repeat:repeat-x !important;
	background-position:top !important;

}
body.no-subhead-sf
{
	background:#e3e3dd url("/92ede430-a533-41e9-9026-761603c3b7f8.png") !important;
	background-repeat:repeat-x !important;
	background-position:top !important;

}

.contacts {
	background: url("/f1f671d6-e1ef-41f2-a318-35cfc8b28416.png");
	/*padding: 23px 19px;*/
}

.contacts .not-loaded {
	background: #efefef url("ff6bbaca-de44-46a5-8129-e3cb6eb06395.gif") no-repeat 50% 50% !important;
	width:240px !important;
	height: 100px !important;
	margin-left:20px;
	margin-top:23px;
	float:left;
	border-bottom:7px solid #efefef;
	box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
	-webkit-box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
	-moz-box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
	-o-box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
	-ms-box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
}

.contacts-card {
	background: #fff;
	border-bottom:7px solid #efefef;
	width:240px !important;
	height:100px !important;
	margin-left:20px;
	margin-top:23px;
	float:left;
	cursor: pointer;
	overflow:hidden;
	-webkit-transition: border 0.4s ease;
   	-moz-transition: border 0.4s ease;
	-o-transition: border 0.7s ease;
		box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
	-webkit-box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
	-moz-box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
	-o-box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
	-ms-box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
}

.contacts-card:hover {
	/*border-bottom:7px solid #d0003b;*/
	border-bottom:7px solid #333;
	-webkit-transition: border 0.7s ease;
    -moz-transition: border 0.7s ease;
	-o-transition: border 0.7s ease;



}
.contacts-card #o_389bb773_961e_4691_b7c7_b758670bbc9b{
	display:none !important;
}

.contacts-card.selected {
	/*border-bottom:7px solid #d0003b;*/
	border-bottom:7px solid #333;
}
.contacts-card.selected #o_fb92e51a_8c92_45e5_8bef_d19dda84fdb4{
	display:none !important;
}
.contacts-table {
	background: url("/41fc377d-bb97-4c45-86e4-8da337821135.png");
	background-repeat:repeat-x;
	background-position:top left;
	border-bottom:1px solid #d9d9d9;
	height:62px !important;
	margin-right:10px;
width:99% !important;
	cursor: pointer;
	border-left:2px solid #fff;
	-webkit-transition: border 0.4s ease;
   	-moz-transition: border 0.4s ease;
	-o-transition: border 0.4s ease;
min-width:770px;
overflow:hidden;
}
.contacts-table:hover {
/*border-left:2px solid #d0003b;*/
border-left:2px solid #333;
margin-left:6px;
	}

.contacts-table.selected {
	background: url("/41fc377d-bb97-4c45-86e4-8da337821135.png");
	background-repeat:repeat-x;
	background-position:top left;
	border-bottom:1px solid #d9d9d9;
		/*border-left:2px solid #d0003b;*/
border-left:2px solid #333;
	height:62px !important;
	margin-right:10px;
	cursor: pointer;
	width:99% !important;
	box-shadow: 0 0 3px #ccc;
    box-shadow: 0 0 3px #ccc;
    -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 3px #ccc;
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 3px #ccc;
	margin-left:6px;
	-webkit-transition: margin-left 0.7s ease;
    -moz-transition: margin-left 0.7s ease;
	-o-transition: margin-left 0.7s ease;
	min-width:770px;
overflow:hidden;
}


/* New contact lists
--------------------------------------------------*/
.contact-lists-upd {
left: -10px !important;
overflow:auto;
}
.contact-lists-upd ul li {
padding: 8px 0px;
padding-left: 20px;
border-top: 1px solid #fff;
border-bottom: 1px solid #dddddd;
cursor:pointer;
clear:both;
position:relative;
display:block;
height:16px;
}
.contact-lists-upd ul li:hover {
background:#fff;
}
.contact-lists-upd ul li span {
font-size:13px;
text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #fff;
}
.contact-lists-upd .count {
	width:23px;
	height:16px;
	text-align:center;
	font-weight:bold;
	font-size:10px;
	line-height:16px;
	text-shadow:none !important;
	border-radius: 4px;
	-moz-border-radius: 4px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
	margin-right: 5px;
}
.contact-lists-upd .count, .contact-lists-upd .list-item, .contact-lists-upd .edit-cl {
	display:block;
	position:relative;
	float:left;
}
.contact-lists-upd .edit-cl {
	float:right;
	margin-top:-2px;
	display:none;
}
.contact-lists-upd ul li:hover .edit-cl {
	display:block;
	margin-right:3px;
}


.search-subhead-upd {
	border:1px solid #d9d9d9;
}
.search-field-button-upd {
	background: url("/8bf2f8ec-95a3-433e-b2b6-14a453f3ce08.png");
	background-repeat:repeat-x;
	background-position:top left;
	width:28px !important;
	height:23px !important;
	border:0px;
	cursor:pointer;
}

.page-caption {
font-size:24px !important;
}

.text_phone-tab, .text_email-tab {
font-size:16px;
overflow:hidden;
padding-top:2px;
}
.text_email-tab {
text-align:right;
overflow:hidden;
font-size:16px;
}
.text_address-tab, .text_position-tab {
font-size:12px !important;
color:#656565 !important;
overflow:hidden;
}
.text_firstname, .text_lastname {
font-size:15px;
cursor: pointer;
font-weight:bold;
overflow:hidden !important;
font-family: Arial !important;
padding:0px;
margin:0px;
}

.text_city {
font-size:10px;
color:#777;
cursor: pointer;
overflow:hidden !important;
font-family: Arial !important;
padding:0px;
margin:0px;
}

.text_phone, .text_email {
font-size:10px;
cursor: pointer;
overflow:hidden !important;
height:14px !important;
word-wrap:break-word !important;
}

.text_fullname {
font-size:24px !important;
overflow:hidden !important;
height:28px;
}
.text_address_big {
font-size:12px !important;
color:#656565 !important;
overflow:hidden !important;
}
.text_phone_big, .text_email_big {
font-size:14px !important;
height:20px !important;
color:#3d3d3d !important;
overflow:hidden !important;
}

.text_note {
font-size:10px !important;
color:#666666 !important;
overflow:hidden !important;
}
.text_note_big {
font-size:10px !important;
color:#666666 !important;
overflow:hidden !important;
height:26px !important;
}



.sm-active {
background:#fff;
}

.search-subhead {
	border:1px solid #bebebe;
	border-radius: 5px;
	-moz-border-radius: 5px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 5px;
	background:#fff url("/cfb9cf05-8bee-4a74-be1b-4ead072758d8.png");
	background-repeat:repeat-x;
	background-position:top left;
	outline:none !important;
	font-size:16px !important;
}

.search-field-button {
	background: url("/5ecc8aa0-2e2d-46e2-b87b-153666af99d5.png");
	background-repeat:repeat-x;
	background-position:top left;
	width:25px !important;
	height:24px !important;
	border:0px;
	cursor:pointer;
}

.search-field-button:hover {
	background: url("/2ad7f284-aa6e-41ef-9b16-b72bb7802798.png");
}

.subhead-divider {
	background: url("/0edf5832-b496-4d4a-a326-7c379a67af96.png");
	background-repeat:repeat-y;
	background-position:top left;
}

.contacts-alphabet table{
border:0px;
}
.contacts-alphabet table tr td, .contacts-alphabet .cell{
	border:0px;
	color:#c3c3c3;
	font-size:14px;
	font-weight:bold;
	text-align:center;

	border-radius: 5px;
	-moz-border-radius: 5px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 5px;
	cursor:pointer;
}

.contacts-alphabet .row_selected td{
background:#bfbfbf url("/a7983b86-61d3-4647-9474-97780b5e5694.png") !important;
	background-repeat:repeat-x;
	color:#000 !important;

}

.contacts-alphabet table td:hover{
color:#000;
}

.contacts-alphabet table tr{

	border-radius: 5px;
	-moz-border-radius: 5px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 5px;
}


/* Sprites and style for top panel buttons
---------------------------------------------------*/
.add-button-upd, .view-card-button-upd, .view-card-button-upd-0, .contlist-button, .select-upd, .delete-upd, .group-upd {
	padding-top:16px;
	text-align:center;
	text-decoration:none;
	outline:none !important;
}
.add-button-upd span, .view-card-button-upd span, .contlist-button span, .select-upd span, .delete-upd span, .group-upd span {
	font:10px Arial !important;
	color:#000 !important;
}
.view-card-button-upd-0 span {
	font:10px Arial !important;
	color:#777 !important;
}


.add-button-upd {
    background: url("/b9b3a12d-443a-46c8-bcfd-830ffd63ffd8.png") no-repeat top center;
}
.view-card-button-upd {
	background: url("/434c15b3-0002-47a1-ad12-c83b31cc58f7.png") no-repeat top center;
}
.view-card-button-upd-0 {
	background: url("/75f65890-0bc1-45d8-a560-c63be745f984.png") no-repeat top center;
}
.contlist-button {
	background: url("/88f6fb84-5154-4d8f-8d61-93382133c6eb.png") no-repeat top center;
}
.select-upd {
	background: url("/b977986c-4a7b-4be3-a8ed-6b25a83fa1f9.png") no-repeat top center;
}
.delete-upd {
	background: url("/fcff8f3b-2492-4278-b298-5438f7ef744a.png") no-repeat top center;
}
.group-upd {
	background: url("/cf2d7bb3-1ef8-40c9-98c9-68ca3d3468e6.png") no-repeat top center;
}





.add-button {

	background: url("/73c95ef2-3c3f-4163-b52d-a54064167abd.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;

}

.macros-button {

	background: url("/e1edb281-ff68-4f59-8dc0-88ccf100a6b9.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:5% 40%;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align: center;
	text-decoration:none;
	outline:none !important;
}

.macros-button span{
		border-bottom: 1px dotted black;
}
.add-button-horizontal {

	background: url("/73c95ef2-3c3f-4163-b52d-a54064167abd.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:middle left;
	padding-left:16px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:13px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
	color:#548000 !important;
}
.add-button-horizontal span {
font-size:14px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
	color:#548000 !important;
}

.delete-button-horizontal {

	background: url("/a8fbd67a-41a1-4bbf-bb65-a52ba0fa9860.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:middle left;
	padding-left:16px;
	text-align:center;
	font-size:13px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
	color:#db0000 !important;
}
.delete-button-horizontal span {
font-size:14px !important;
	text-decoration:none;
	color:#db0000 !important;
}
.group-button {

	background: url("/10ff0d40-4f69-4e1b-a1c4-5c51df9ff03d.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font:10px Arial !important;
	text-decoration:none;
	outline:none !important;
}
.group-button-0 {

	background: url("/2cad06e1-5d4f-48b1-937d-9f79077cd896.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font:10px Arial !important;
	text-decoration:none;
	color:#ccc !important;
	outline:none !important;
	cursor: default;
}

.delete-button {
 	background: url("/063ca3c0-7cf3-4283-ab37-40400362ffaa.png");
   	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
	padding-top:20px;
	text-align:center;
	font:10px Arial !important;
	text-decoration:none;
	outline:none !important;
}
.delete-button-1 {
 	background: url("/03580ec1-9c0a-4ff9-bec5-2b39cff15232.png");
 	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
   padding-top: 20px;
   text-align: center;
   font-size: 10px !important;
   text-decoration: none;
}
.delete-button-0 {
 	background: url("/d30efc34-ac6f-4f1c-bbf1-13d61690b02c.png");
 	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
   padding-top: 20px;
   text-align: center;
   font-size: 10px !important;
   text-decoration: none;
   cursor: default;
}

.clset-button {
 	background: url("/d29efdb4-731b-43c3-8db4-b3e2bdf94f7b.png");
 	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
   padding-top: 20px;
   text-align: center;
   font-size: 10px !important;
   text-decoration: none;
}
.clset-button-0 {
 	background: url("/03dbf467-4157-47f7-9f1d-2a1fa2fb3cc8.png");
 	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
   padding-top: 20px;
   text-align: center;
   font-size: 10px !important;
   text-decoration: none;
   cursor: default;
}
.view-card-button {
 	background: url("/d5bee779-99f4-4720-8328-56311f890618.png");
 	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
   padding-top: 20px;
   text-align: center;
   font-size: 10px !important;
   text-decoration: none;
}
.view-card-button-0 {
 	background: url("/75f65890-0bc1-45d8-a560-c63be745f984.png");
 	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:top center;
   padding-top: 20px;
   text-align: center;
   font-size: 10px !important;
   text-decoration: none;
   cursor: default;
}

.select-clist-button {


	text-align:center;
	font-size:18px !important;
	text-decoration:none;

}

.select-clist-button span {
text-decoration:none;
	border-bottom:1px dashed #0087cd;
	background: url("/c663a600-47c0-407f-8b2d-3cb687a580e4.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:right;
	padding-right:20px;
}

.view-contact-clist-button {


	text-align:center;
	font-size:18px !important;
	text-decoration:none;

}

.view-contact-clist-button span {
text-decoration:none;
	border-bottom:1px dashed #000000;
	background: url("/c663a600-47c0-407f-8b2d-3cb687a580e4.png");
	background-repeat:no-repeat;
	background-position:right;
	padding-right:20px;
}

/* New white popdown
--------------------------------------------------*/
.popdown-upd {
	box-shadow: 5px 5px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
	-webkit-box-shadow: 5px 5px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
	-moz-box-shadow: 5px 5px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
	-o-box-shadow: 5px 5px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
	-ms-box-shadow: 5px 5px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
}

.popdown-upd .pop-caption {
	font-size:14px !important;
}
.chechbox-group-dt {
	border:1px solid #d9d9d9;
}
.chechbox-group-dt table {
	border:0px !important;
}
.chechbox-group-dt table tr td{
	border:0px !important;
}
.chechbox-group-dt .cell-0 {
	width:24px !important;
}
.chechbox-group-dt caption {
	display:none !important;
}



.popdown .pop-bg{
background: url("/59c08fbc-0467-45c5-a82b-c2d02de30d82.png");
}

.pop-bg-up{
background: url("/59c08fbc-0467-45c5-a82b-c2d02de30d82.png") !important;
}

.popdown .pop-caption{
color:#fff;
font-size:18px;
font-weight:bold;
}

.popdown .list-datatable table {
border:0px;
color:#fff;
height:0px !important;
}
.popdown .list-datatable table tr {
height:26px !important;
overflow:hidden !important;

display:block;
vertical-align:top;
}

.popdown .list-datatable table td{
border:0px;
color:#fff;
font-size:14px;
height:26px !important;
overflow:hidden !important;

vertical-align:top;
}
.popdown .list-datatable table .cell-0{
width:16px;

}

/* OLD BUTTONS */

.button-green, .button-gray, .button-gray-bright, .button-yellow-bright, .button-no-border, .button-green-bright, .button-red-bright {

text-align:center !important;

.button-green span, .button-gray span, .button-gray-bright span, .button-yellow-bright span, .button-green-bright span, .button-no-border span, .button-red-bright span{
line-height:20px !important;
font-size:14px;

}

.button-gray {
	border:3px solid #616161;

}

.button-gray-bright {
	border:3px solid #dedede;

}

.button-green {
	border:3px solid #77a027;

}
.button-green-bright {
	border:3px solid #aad459;

}

.button-yellow-bright {
	border:3px solid #e1ca79;

}

.button-red-bright {
	border:3px solid #ff8b8b;

}*/
/* END OF OLD BUTTONS */

/* NEW BUTTONS */
.prosuite-button {
	text-align:center !important;
	background:#a4a4a4 url("/778b6939-ac8a-4fe5-8b46-47088ab39eaf.png") !important;
	background-repeat:repeat-x;
	background-position:bottom center;
	text-decoration:none;
	line-height:25px;
	border-radius: 8px;
	-moz-border-radius:8px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 8px;
	cursor:pointer;
	outline:none !important;
	height:25px !important;
}
.prosuite-button span {
	line-height:20px !important;
	font-size:14px;
}
.prosuite-button-butt {
	 text-align:center !important;
	 background:#fff url("/4fc835ad-37e4-4027-95df-1f18499379e9.png") !important;
	 background-repeat:repeat-x;
	 background-position:bottom center;
	 text-decoration:none;
	 line-height:25px;
	 border:1px solid #c5c5c5;
	 border-radius: 6px;
	 -moz-border-radius:6px;
	 -webkit-border-radius: 6px;
	 -o-border-radius:6px;
	 -ms-border-radius: 6px;
	 cursor:pointer;
	 outline:none !important;
	 height:26px !important;
	 box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 3px #fff;
		-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 3px #fff;
		-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 3px #fff;
	 -o-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 3px #fff;
	 -ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 3px #fff;
	 -webkit-transition: all 0.7s ease;
		-moz-transition: all 0.7s ease;
	 -o-transition: all 0.7s ease;
	  line-height:22px !important;
	 font-size:14px !important;
	color:#000;
	font-family:Arial,sans-serif;
}
.prosuite-button-butt:hover {
		 box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 6px #fff;
		-moz-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 6px #fff;
		-webkit-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 6px #fff;
	 -o-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 6px #fff;
	 -ms-box-shadow:inset 0px 0px 6px #fff;
	 border:1px solid #a8a8a8;
}

/* END OF NEW BUTTONS */

.tabNavigation li{
font-size:14px;

}

.tabNavigation li a{
font-size:14px;
text-decoration:none;
padding:5px;
background:#fff;
border-radius: 4px;
	-moz-border-radius:4px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 4px;

}
.tabNavigation li a.active{
font-size:14px;
text-decoration:none;
padding:5px;
background:#bce2ff;
border-radius: 4px;
	-moz-border-radius:4px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
}

.admin-datatable table{
height:0px !important;
border-collapse:collapse;
border:0px;
margin-top:10px;
}
.admin-datatable caption{
text-align:left;
font-size:18px;
margin-bottom:15px;
}
.admin-datatable table .thead {
background:#fff url("/cfb50d1b-24fb-494b-bb18-2cf85ab7f6d4.png");
background-repeat:repeat-x;
background-position:bottom right;
border:0px;
border-top:1px solid #ececec;
border-bottom:1px solid #ececec;
border-radius: 4px;
	-moz-border-radius:4px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
}
.admin-datatable table .thead .th-cell {
border:0px;
text-align:left;
}
.admin-datatable table .thead .th-cell-0{
border:0px;
border-left:1px solid #ececec;
border-radius: 4px;
	-moz-border-radius:4px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
	width:32px;
}
.admin-datatable table .thead .th-cell-2{
border:0px;
border-right:1px solid #ececec;
border-radius: 4px;
	-moz-border-radius:4px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
}
.admin-datatable table tr td{
border:0px;
text-align:left;
border-bottom:1px dotted #bfbfbf;
line-height:27px;
}

.table-rules-header {
font-size:10px;
color:#fff;
background:#000;
padding:3px;
border-radius: 4px;
-moz-border-radius:4px;
-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
}
.table-rules-data-row td{
border-bottom:1px dotted #bfbfbf;

}
#rules_table {
border-collapse:collapse !important;
}
#name .table-rules-header {
display:none;
}
.table-rules-td {

}

}

}

background-position:bottom center;
}

.del-user img {

}


.datatable-find-users table{

}

.datatable-find-users table td{

}
.datatable-find-users table .cell-0 {

}

.username-logged {
text-align:right !important;
font-weight:bold !important;
color:#555;
}
.contact-lists {overflow:auto !important;}
.contact-lists ul li{
padding-left:18px;
font-size:12px;
line-height:1.3;
padding-top:8px !important;
padding-bottom:9px !important;
background-image:url("/3bce9d10-c366-4ba9-9fac-6f207707ffbd.png");
background-repeat:no-repeat;
background-position:3% 50%;
cursor:pointer;
display:block;
padding-bottom:1px;
overflow:hidden;
vertical-align:top;
clear:both;
}
.contact-lists ul li span.list-item {
width:96px;
display:block;
overflow:hidden;
float:left;
word-wrap:break-word;
}
.contact-lists ul li.active {
background-color:#fff;
border-radius: 8px 0px 0px 8px;
-moz-border-radius: 8px 0px 0px 8px;
-webkit-border-radius: 8px 0px 0px 8px;
border-bottom:1px solid #e5e5e5;
padding-bottom:8px !important;
}

.contact-lists ul li.list-item-all {
padding-left:18px;
font-size:12px;
background-image:none;
}

.contact-lists ul li.list-item-new {
padding-left:18px;
font-size:12px;
background-image:url("/2072d6ed-7e97-4122-93ec-5a6c712e625b.png");
background-repeat:no-repeat;
background-position:3% 50%;
color:#33700b;
}
.contact-lists ul li .count {
padding:2px;
padding-left:5px;
padding-right:5px;
border-radius: 5px;
	-moz-border-radius: 5px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 5px;
	margin-left:5px;
	font-size:8px;
	display:block;
	float:left;

}

.button-cont {
	background:#fff url("/2ac370ee-d24b-4532-ae0e-e32bd018a4f6.png");
	background-repeat:repeat-x;
	background-position:bottom center;
	border:1px solid #d9d9d9;
	border-radius: 4px;
	-moz-border-radius: 4px;
	-webkit-border-radius: 4px;
	box-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
	-webkit-box-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
	-moz-box-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
	-o-box-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
	-ms-box-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

	.ug_datatable_title {

/* end of rules page*/

/* Tree container */
	ul.dynatree-container
	{
		font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica;
		font-size: 10pt; /* font size should not be too big */
		white-space: nowrap;
		padding: 3px;

		background-color: transparent !important;


		overflow: auto;

		text-align: left !important;
	}

	ul.dynatree-container ul
	{
		padding: 0 0 0 0;
		margin: 0;
		background: none;
	}

	ul.dynatree-container li
	{
		background: none;
		margin-left: 0;


		list-style-image: none;
		list-style-position: outside;
		list-style-type: none;
		-moz-background-clip:border;
		-moz-background-inline-policy: continuous;
		-moz-background-origin: padding;
	}
	/* Suppress lines for last child node */
	ul.dynatree-container li.dynatree-lastsib
	{
		background-image: none;
	}
	/* Suppress lines if level is fixed expanded (option minExpandLevel) */
	ul.dynatree-no-connector > li
	{
		background-image: none;
	}

	/* Style, when control is disabled */
	.ui-dynatree-disabled ul.dynatree-container
	{
		opacity: 0.5;
	/*	filter: alpha(opacity=50); /* Yields a css warning */
		background-color: silver;
	}

	/* Common icon definitions
	 */
	span.dynatree-empty,
	span.dynatree-vline,
	span.dynatree-connector,
	span.dynatree-expander,
	span.dynatree-checkbox,
	span.dynatree-radio,
	span.dynatree-drag-helper-img,
	#dynatree-drop-marker
	{
		background: none;
		padding-left: 3px;
	}

	span.dynatree-icon {
		width: 0;
		height: 16px;
	}

	/** Used by 'icon' node option: */
	ul.dynatree-container img
	{
		width: 18px;
		height: 18px;
		padding-left: 5px;
		vertical-align: top;
		border-style: none;

	}


	/* Lines and connectors
	 */
	span.dynatree-expander,
	span.dynatree-connector
	{
		background: none;
	}

	/* Node titles */

	/* @Chrome: otherwise hit area of node titles is broken (issue 133)
	   Removed again for issue 165; (133 couldn't be reproduced) */
	span.dynatree-node
	{
	/*  display: -moz-inline-box; /* @ FF 1+2 */
	/*  display: inline-block; /* Required to make a span sizeable */
	}


	/* Remove blue color and underline from title links */
	ul.dynatree-container a
	/*, ul.dynatree-container a:visited*/
	{
		color: black; /* inherit doesn't work on IE */
		text-decoration: none;
		vertical-align: top;
		margin: 0px;
		margin-left: 3px;
	/*	outline: 0; /* @ Firefox, prevent dotted border after click */
	}

	ul.dynatree-container a:hover
	{
	/*	text-decoration: underline; */
		background: none; /* light blue */
		color: #C74551;
	}

	span.dynatree-node a
	{
		font-weight: normal;
		display: inline-block; /* Better alignment, when title contains <br> */
	/*	vertical-align: top;*/
		padding-left: 3px;
		padding-right: 3px; /* Otherwise italic font will be outside bounds */
		/*	line-height: 16px; /* should be the same as img height, in case 16 px */
		line-height: 18px;
	}
	span.dynatree-folder a
	{
		font-weight: normal;
	}


	ul.dynatree-container a:focus,
	span.dynatree-focused a:link  /* @IE */
	{
		background: none; /* gray */
	}

	span.dynatree-has-children a
	{
	}

	span.dynatree-expanded a
	{
	}

	span.dynatree-selected a
	{
		color: green;
		font-style: italic;
	}

	span.dynatree-active a
	{
		background: none!important;
		color: #C74551 !important; /* @ IE6 */

	}

	span.dynatree-active {

		display: block;
		background: url("/5c443d30-f8c6-4653-b151-ebf6cd202cfd.png") right center no-repeat #f2f2f2 ;
	}


	li span.dynatree-active {

	}

	/* Drag'n'drop support
	 */

	/*** Helper object */
	div.dynatree-drag-helper{}
	div.dynatree-drag-helper a
	{
		border: 1px solid gray;
		background-color: none;
		padding-left: 5px;
		padding-right: 5px;
		opacity: 0.8;
	}
	span.dynatree-drag-helper-img
	{
		/*
		position: relative;
		left: -16px;
		*/
	}
	div.dynatree-drag-helper /*.dynatree-drop-accept*/
	{
	/*    border-color: green;
		background-color: red;*/
	}
	div.dynatree-drop-accept span.dynatree-drag-helper-img
	{
		background-position: -32px -112px;
	}
	div.dynatree-drag-helper.dynatree-drop-reject
	{
		border-color: red;
	}
	div.dynatree-drop-reject span.dynatree-drag-helper-img
	{
		background-position: -16px -112px;
	}

/* end of Tree container*/

/* users and groups  */

	.add-button-horizontal {

		background: url("/73c95ef2-3c3f-4163-b52d-a54064167abd.png");
		background-repeat:no-repeat;

		padding-left:16px;
		text-align:center;

	}

/* end of  users and groups  */

.cont-list-circle {
border-radius: 8px;
		-moz-border-radius:8px;
		-webkit-border-radius: 8px;
		margin:3px;
		padding:1px;
		box-shadow:inset 2px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
    -moz-box-shadow:inset 2px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
    -webkit-box-shadow:inset 2px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
	 -o-box-shadow:inset 2px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
	  -ms-box-shadow:inset 2px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
	float:right !important;
}

/* END OF CONTACT LIST CIRCLES */

/*connection page*/
.form_connection{
	border:2px solid #dcdcdc;
	background:#eee;
}

.form_connection_state{
	border:2px solid #dcdcdc;
	background:#fff;
}

.container_disable{
	opacity:0.8;
	background:#eee;
}

.failed{
	color:#d0302d;
	background: url("/00e7d342-c349-47fb-9a77-755c4bb73460.res") no-repeat;
}

.success{
	color:#3b7820;
	background: url("/a2b506cb-9431-4aa6-8cc1-59d93478dbe1.res") no-repeat;
}

.failed span, .success span{
	margin-left:20px;
}

.rdb_scheme div div label{
	font-size:16px;
	font-weight:bold;
	margin-left:8px;
}



/*start button*/
.top_start_container{
	height:7px;
	background: #262626;
}

.first_block{
	background:#333333 !important;
}


.block_start_container{
	height:35px;
	background:url("/7ed7e0bf-3352-4ec0-a433-46222d3e2fe4.res") repeat-x;
	color:#888;

}

.app_start_container{
	height:30px;
	background:url("/f31c71cc-859d-450e-aa26-c157299db807.res") repeat-x !important;
}
.app_start_container:hover, .app-like:hover {
	background:#484848 !important;
}

.switch-to {
	background:url("/70eed1ee-5b28-4dc3-ae72-8a3507cb03b1.res") no-repeat left 5px !important;
	padding-left:30px;
}
.current-user {
	background:url("/0d112d90-5d1e-4748-b611-0911374f2476.res") no-repeat left 5px !important;
	padding-left:30px;
}

.center_align_block, .center_align_app {
	margin-left:22px;
}

.block_start_container a, .app_start_container a{
	font-size:12px;
	color:#fff;
	text-decoration:none;
}

.center_align_app{
	padding-top:4px;
	clear:both;
}

.center_align_app a, .center_align_app img {
	display:block;
	float:left;
	line-height: 24px;
}
.center_align_app a {
	padding-left: 6px;
	width: 215px;
}
.center_align_app img {
	width:24px;
	height:24px;
}

.center_align_block{
	padding-top:10px;
	clear:both;
}

.center_align_block a, .center_align_block img {
	display:block;
	float:left;
	line-height: 24px;
	margin-top: -4px;
}
.center_align_block a {
	padding-left: 6px;
	width: 215px;
}

.bottom_start_container{
	height:13px;
	background: #262626;
}


/* MACRO COLLECTION */
.macro-cont {
	background: url("/d981e55e-81db-4172-92b1-4718256dc5bf.png");
	background-repeat:repeat-x;
	background-position:bottom !important;

}
.top-menu-item div {
	overflow:hidden !important;
}
.img-grid {
	width:32px;
	height:32px;
	overflow:hidden !important;
	cursor:pointer;
}
.img-grid img {
	width:13px;
	height:13px;
	display:block;
	float:left;
	padding:1px;
}
.top-menu-item p {
	padding:0px;
	margin:0px;
 }
 .top-macros-buttons {
	overflow:hidden !important;
	margin-top:10px !important;
	cursor:pointer;
	text-align:center;
}
.top-macros-buttons img {
	height:32px !important;
}
.macr-label-but{
	width:90px!important;
	overflow:hidden !important;
	height:14px;
	display:block;
}

.lt-ie10 .ov-item {position:relative; display:block; float:left !important;}
.lt-ie10 .img-grid img {float:left !important;}
/* END OF MACRO COLLECTION */

* Plugins pop-up datatable
--------------------------------------------------*/
.macro-popup .table {height:0px !important; border:0px !important; border-collapse:collapse !important;}
.macro-popup .table td {border:0px !important; border-bottom:1px dotted #cecece !important; padding-top:12px; padding-bottom:12px; font-size:14px; color:#0d89f1; cursor:pointer;}
.macro-popup .cell-1 img {width:16px;}
.macro-popup .table {height:0px; border:0px !important; border-collapse:collapse;}
.macro-popup .table td {border:0px;}
.macro-popup td.cell-1 {width:16px;}

/*------------------------------------------------*/

/* FOR DISABLED BUTTONS */
.disabled {opacity:0.7;}
.disabled span {color:#777 !important;}

/* Object view drag&drop */
.ov-drag-helper {width:120px !important; height:53px !important;
background: url("/a46f2e4e-5296-4a1e-8058-218e4a597c21.png") no-repeat !important; box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); -webkit-box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); -moz-box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); -o-box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); -ms-box-shadow: 2px 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); }

.throb-test {opacity:0; position:fixed !important; left:50% !important; top:50% !important; margin-left:-14px; margin-top:-14px; -webkit-transition: opacity 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: opacity 0.3s ease; background:rgba(255,255,255,0.5) !important; z-index:999;}
.lt-ie10 .throb-test {display:none;}
.loading .throb-test {opacity:0.9;}
.lt-ie10 .loading .throb-test {display:block;}

.lt-ie10 .sf-cont .table tr td.cell-2, .lt-ie10 .sf-cont .table tr td.cell-2 input[type=text] {width:100px;}

.lt-ie10 .boxy-inner {  border:1px solid #dcdcdc;}
.lt-ie10 .boxy-modal-blackout {background: url('/d4cb4061-34b1-4249-900a-2a2ef3acd9c9.png');}
